pr_title: Refactor services and handlers. And fixed bug of getting all categories.

timeline.message:
# Removed unnecessary parameters from constructors and removed unnecessary creation of unused service objects in methods.

Signed-off-by: immmus <fonto.trg@gmail.com>

# Fixed problem with get all categories request

Signed-off-by: immmus <fonto.trg@gmail.com>

# Moved methods to another class to remove dependency in parameters

Signed-off-by: immmus <fonto.trg@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: I am unsure why you made this change. One side effect is that it removes the serviceName from being passed , so the service name cannot be included in diagnostics. Please revert or ensure the refactor has no side effects.
timeline.author: davidradl
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -57,22 +52,10 @@
      * Construct the Subject Area Category Handler
      * needed to operate within a single server instance.
      *
-     * @param serviceName             name of the consuming service
-     * @param serverName              name of this server instance
-     * @param invalidParameterHandler handler for invalid parameters
-     * @param repositoryHelper        helper used by the converters
-     * @param repositoryHandler       handler for calling the repository services
      * @param oMRSAPIHelper           omrs API helper
-     * @param errorHandler            handler for repository service errors
      */
-    public SubjectAreaCategoryHandler(String serviceName,
-                                      String serverName,
-                                      InvalidParameterHandler invalidParameterHandler,
-                                      OMRSRepositoryHelper repositoryHelper,
-                                      RepositoryHandler repositoryHandler,
-                                      OMRSAPIHelper oMRSAPIHelper,
-                                      RepositoryErrorHandler errorHandler) {
-        super(serviceName, serverName, invalidParameterHandler, repositoryHelper, repositoryHandler, oMRSAPIHelper);
+    public SubjectAreaCategoryHandler(OMRSAPIHelper oMRSAPIHelper) {

replies.bodyText: There are no side effects in this case, I just took these general parameters to one place, removing duplication.
replies.author: immmus

replies.bodyText: @immmus Can you detail where the serviceName is supplied - I did not spot that?
replies.author: davidradl

replies.bodyText:
Yes, I brought all this logic to OMRSAPIHelper to get rid of duplication in the classes that use it
https://github.com/odpi/egeria/pull/3137/files#diff-45f8a331380b8ce75ae5ea724cc52d46
replies.author: immmus

replies.bodyText: get can be done using getters
replies.author: immmus

replies.bodyText: @immmus  Sorry - I still do not get it. These are parameters supplied on a constructor - I am not sure how getters can set them? Please can you indicate the line numbers you are referring to.
replies.author: davidradl

replies.bodyText:
I meant that if you need parameters in the future, you can get them using the getter.
For example line 72 - https://github.com/odpi/egeria/blob/1e4eb3dcbed3029a179131801b4942842f47eb07/open-metadata-implementation/access-services/subject-area/subject-area-server/src/main/java/org/odpi/openmetadata/accessservices/subjectarea/utilities/OMRSAPIHelper.java
Initialization as before,  I just removed the repetitions -https://github.com/odpi/egeria/pull/3137/files#diff-2d5677098874d14f512101635e153031
Initialization logic has not changed from this
replies.author: immmus

replies.bodyText: @immmus I looked more closely and I think the logic is sound. I have merged.
replies.author: davidradl

timeline.bodyText: please can you leave the icon  code in - this is functionality we are likely to add in the future
timeline.author: davidradl

replies.bodyText:
All this code has been moved to another class so as not to have dependencies in the parameters. I didn’t delete anything, I just removed an unnecessary parameter
https://github.com/odpi/egeria/pull/3137/files#diff-45f8a331380b8ce75ae5ea724cc52d46
replies.author: immmus
